message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.GT. 

The paper proposes a new method for learning from a single demonstration using reinforcement learning, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The method involves maximizing rewards directly, which is a common approach in machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also applies the method to the Atari game Montezuma's Revenge, which involves visual perception and image processing (cs.CV). Additionally, the paper discusses the scalability of reinforcement learning for tasks with sparse rewards, which is related to robotics and control (cs.RO). Finally, the paper presents a trained agent achieving a high-score, which is a result in game theory (cs.GT).
